A

ActivationStrategy - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags.strategy
This interface represents a custom strategy for deciding whether a Strategizable instance will be active or not.

C

com.amitinside.featureflags - package com.amitinside.featureflags
Provides API for managing all Feature instances
com.amitinside.featureflags.feature - package com.amitinside.featureflags.feature
Provides API to represent Feature instance
com.amitinside.featureflags.feature.group - package com.amitinside.featureflags.feature.group
Provides API to represent FeatureGroup instance
com.amitinside.featureflags.strategy - package com.amitinside.featureflags.strategy
Provides API to represent Feature activation strategy
Constants - Class in com.amitinside.featureflags
Constants used with the FeatureService service.

D

disableFeature(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureService
Changes the specified feature's enabled property to false.
disableGroup(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureService
Changes the specified feature group's enabled property to false.

E

enableFeature(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureService
Changes the specified feature's enabled property to true.
enableGroup(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureService
Changes the specified feature group's enabled property to true.

F

Feature - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags.feature
A feature is defined by its name.
FEATURE_FACTORY_PID - Static variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.Constants
Factory PID of Feature configuration instances
FEATURE_GROUP_FACTORY_PID - Static variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.Constants
Factory PID of FeatureGroup configuration instances
FeatureGroup - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags.feature.group
A feature group is defined by its name.
FeatureService - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags
The FeatureService service is the applications access point to the Feature Flag functionality.

I

isEnabled() - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.feature.Feature
Checks whether the feature is enabled in its configuration.
isEnabled() - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.feature.group.FeatureGroup
Checks whether the feature group is enabled.
isEnabled(Strategizable, Map<String, Object>) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.strategy.ActivationStrategy
This method is responsible to decide whether a feature is active or not.
isFeatureEnabled(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureService
Returns true if a feature with the given name is known and enabled under the feature associated strategy.
isGroupEnabled(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureService
Returns true if a feature group with the given name is known and enabled under the associated strategy.

S

Strategizable - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags
A class implements the Strategizable interface to indicate that the instances of the class can be used to provide strategic information for its enablement.
